summary: Comprehensive testing of Portuguese Personal Finance App completed successfully. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working with minor compilation warnings resolved.

issues: Minor React Hook dependency warning in AuthContext.js - useEffect missing 'fetchUser' dependency

passed_tests: Backend categories CRUD operations (12 default categories created)
Backend transactions CRUD operations (income/expense creation, filtering, updates)
Backend savings goals CRUD operations (creation, updates, progress tracking)
Backend AI tips integration (GPT-5.2 via Emergent)
Frontend landing page loads with login/register tabs
Frontend user registration flow creates account and redirects to dashboard
Frontend user login flow authenticates and redirects to dashboard
Frontend dashboard displays stats cards (balance, income, expenses, goals)
Frontend dashboard shows monthly chart and category pie chart
Frontend navigation between pages (dashboard, transactions, goals, AI tips)
Frontend transaction modal opens with income/expense tabs
Frontend category selection works in transaction form
Frontend logout functionality redirects to login page
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (20/20 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (15/16 flows tested successfully)
